name: Tweak Synth Analog
description: A virtual analog subractive synth programmed in UVI Falcon

parameters.name: Osc 1 Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for oscillator 1. Should normally be between 0.6 and 1.

parameters.name: Osc 2 Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for oscillator 2. Should normally be between 0.6 and 1.

parameters.name: Noise Level
parameters.description: The mixer level for the noise oscillator. Should normally be between 0.3 and 0.8.

parameters.name: Wave Osc 1
parameters.description: The waveform for oscillator 1

parameters.name: Wave Osc 2
parameters.description: The waveform for oscillator 2

parameters.name: Octave Osc 1
parameters.description: The octave offset for oscillator 1.

parameters.name: Pitch Osc 2
parameters.description: The pitch offset for oscillator 2 in semitones.

parameters.name: Fine Pitch Osc 2
parameters.description: The fine pitch for oscillator 2 in cents.

parameters.name: Hardsync Osc 1
parameters.description: Amount of hardsync applied to oscillator 1, given in semitones.

parameters.name: Hardsync Osc 2
parameters.description: Amount of hardsync applied to oscillator 2, given in semitones.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Attack Time
parameters.description: Attack time for the amplitude envelope given in seconds. For slow sounds, like pads, this can be up to one second, but most times it should between 0 and 0.2.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Decay Time
parameters.description: Decay time for the amplitude envelope given in seconds. For slow sounds, like pads, this can be up to 3 seconds, but most times it should between 0.05 and 0.3. Never below 0.05.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Sustain Level
parameters.description: Sustain level for the amplitude envelope. For short, pluck type sounds, this can be set very low (<0.25). For pads and longer sounds, it shoud be above 0.5.

parameters.name: Amplitude Envelope Release Time
parameters.description: Release time for the amplitude envelope given in seconds. It should never be above 1.5 second, and usually bestween 0.02 and 0.6.

parameters.name: Filter Cutoff
parameters.description: This is the cutoff for the low pass filter. If this is set to a low value, it is recommended that Filter Envelope Amount is set high.

parameters.name: Resonance
parameters.description: This is the resonance for the low pass filter. It should never be to high. Somewhere between 0 and 0.6 is recommended.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Amount
parameters.description: Controls the degree to which the low pass filter cutoff frequency is modulated by the filter envelope. Usually between 0.5 and 0.9, especially if the filter cutoff is low.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Attack Time
parameters.description: Attack time for the filter envelope given in seconds. For slow sounds, like pads, this can be up to one second, but most times it should between 0 and 0.2.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Decay Time
parameters.description: Decay time for the filter envelope given in seconds. For slow sounds, like pads, this can be up to 3 seconds, but most times it should between 0.05 and 0.3. Never below 0.05.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Sustain Level
parameters.description: Sustain level for the filter envelope. For short, pluck type sounds, this can be set very low (<0.25). For pads and longer sounds, it shoud be above 0.5.

parameters.name: Filter Envelope Release Time
parameters.description: Release time for the filter envelope given in seconds. It should never be above 1.5 second, and usually bestween 0.02 and 0.6.

parameters.name: Modulation Speed
parameters.description: The speed of the low frequency oscillator in hertz.

parameters.name: Modulation Waveform
parameters.description: The waveform of the low frequency oscillator.

parameters.name: Filter Modulation
parameters.description: The modulation amount for the low pass filter

parameters.name: PWM Modulation Osc 1
parameters.description: Amount of pulse width modulation on oscillator 1

parameters.name: PWM Modulation Osc 2
parameters.description: Amount of pulse width modulation on oscillator 2

parameters.name: Hardsync Modulation Osc 1
parameters.description: The modulation amount for hardsync on oscillator 1

parameters.name: Hardsync Modulation Osc 2
parameters.description: The modulation amount for hardsync on oscillator 2

parameters.name: Play Mode
parameters.description: The playmode controls whether the patch is polyphonic or monophonic. Monophonic patches are typically used for basses and leads.

parameters.name: Glide Time
parameters.description: This parameter sets the glide time in seconds, and is used when one of the portamento play modes are selected. Normally set between 0.01 and 0.1.

parameters.name: Reverb
parameters.description: Amount of reverb effect on the sound. Normally between 0.2 and 0.5.

parameters.name: Delay
parameters.description: Amount of delay effect on the sound. Normally between 0.2 and 0.5.

parameters.name: Arpeggiator
parameters.description: Turn the arpeggiator on or off. Leave off, unless asked to activate.
